about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Frame Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the Python bindings of the LALFrame C libraries
and additional Python modules.

Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.
All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are
part of the `lalframe` package.

name: python-lalframe
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.9
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: python-lalframe
  version: 2.0.0
source:
  sha256: 6b8c4d08ab3ff6d2250aa175c6b32ef24c84d5c0fae24a033ee4e72fd598e03d
  url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/lalframe-2.0.0.tar.xz
build:
  error_overdepending: true

  ignore_run_exports:
    - numpy
    - python

  string: py39h7b9fbcb_1

    - compiler-rt_osx-64 13.0.1 hd3f61c9_0
    - cross-python_osx-arm64 3.9 25_cpython

    - swig 4.0.2 hce5123c_2
    - tapi 1100.0.11 h9ce4665_0
    - tk 8.6.12 h5dbffcc_0
    - tzdata 2022a h191b570_0

    - bzip2 1.0.8 h3422bc3_4
    - ca-certificates 2022.6.15 h4653dfc_0

    - libcblas 3.9.0 15_osxarm64_openblas
    - libffi 3.4.2 h3422bc3_5
    - libgfortran 5.0.0.dev0 11_0_1_hf114ba7_23
    - libgfortran5 11.0.1.dev0 hf114ba7_23

    - liblapack 3.9.0 15_osxarm64_openblas
    - libopenblas 0.3.20 openmp_h2209c59_0

  run:
    - liblalframe 2.0.0 he4db4b2_1
    - numpy >=1.19.5,<2.0a0
    - python >=3.9,<3.10.0a0
    - python-lal >=7.1.0
    - python_abi 3.9.* *_cp39
test:
  commands:
    - python -m pytest -ra -v test/python
  imports:
    - lalframe
    - lalframe.frread
  requires:
    - pytest >=4.0.0a0
  source_files:
    - test/F-TEST-*.gwf
    - test/python
about:
  description: 'The LSC Algorithm Frame Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

    This package contains the Python bindings of the LALFrame C libraries

    and additional Python modules.


    Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.

    All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are

    part of the `lalframe` package.

    '
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite.git
  doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalframe/
  home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: LSC Algorithm Frame Library
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: lalframe
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - skymoo

about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Frame Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the Python bindings of the LALFrame C libraries
and additional Python modules.

Note: this package only provides the importable Python libraries.
All command-line interfaces, scripts, and executables are
part of the `lalframe` package.
